other_tests.findings: Pathological examination of the tissue revealed low-grade papillary urothelial carcinoma, associated with inflammation.
Wandering atrial pacemaker with occasional nonconducted P waves, ventricular rate of 91 beats per minute, first-degree atrioventricular block, and premature ventricular complexes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Rhythm was new as compared with 2 weeks earlier.

other_tests.findings: Extensive involvement by high-grade B-cell lymphoma.
Extensive involvement by high-grade B-cell lymphoma.

other_tests.date: Before treatment and after initial three cycles of chemotherapy
other_tests.findings: Before treatment: extensive abnormal uptake in lymph nodes, spleen, and bone marrow. After three cycles: resolution of abnormal nodal uptake, decreased bone marrow and splenic abnormalities, persistent uptake in the left humeral focus, and a new focus in the left femoral neck.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Marked progression of disease after additional three cycles.
